title: Dear supports, stop roaming after you lose bot tower early.
body: This must had blown over my head or something but why do supports love to roam mid after losing bot tower? It makes no sense to me so can someone explain why I see this every single time a support loses bot.

replies.body: Because once you lose the tower your lane is over.
The enemy bot lane is going to come mid after taking bot tower, thus the support roams mid to likely help the solo mid laner vs 3(or 4 once the jungler comes) other champions?

In my cases the enemy bot never roams mid to take mid tower. I do only play in a silver elo but It makes no sense to me to try to fight to defend after just losing gold especially if your bot lane is behind.
It also tends to happen if the tower is lost before the 10 minute mark. (which is way too early imo to be leaving a lane)

> It also tends to happen if the tower is lost before the 10 minute mark. (which is way too early imo to be leaving a lane)

Once the bot lane takes a tower, they're not going to be there anymore. It leaves you more room to farm(especially early) but that also puts pressure on other lanes. In every game I play, I see bot rotate mid(or occasionally top) after taking first tower. Generally the losing bot lane will follow, because if they don't then they're going to get another tower for free. One solo laner can't defend against 4 other champions. One solo laner and a jungler can't defend against 4 champions either. So they're going to need at the very least a 3rd champion there to help defend. Especially since most junglers currently played don't have much(if any) CC. The support also isn't going to be getting any gold in a lane without enemies unless they're using {{item:3096}} or {{item:3097}}. {{item:3098}} only works if you hit enemy champions or towers with it. You'll get at most 3 procs on a tower if you manage to push to the enemy tower, but you'll be open to ganks very easily with your tower missing.
Because staying bot is a really good way to get murdered by the enemy jungler over and over again

Yeah, all the answers here are correct, but this one is probably the most important. You put a support down there to protect from ganks. Once tower is gone, the adc shouldn't be pushed up far enough to be ganked anymore. If he is, that's poor play imo.

So the support should go mid and join the team and leave the adc to get some solo xp.

I love all the answers but it still makes no sense to me. I guess everyone here just plays a different game than me because In silver elo I can guarantee after bot lane gets a tower they normally still stay bot. I just continue to lose games when my support barely does anything in lane with me then blames me for "losing lane" while I'm working my butt off to 2v1 and still be able to cs. I really do understand that everyone here has a much better understanding of the game than people I'm matched with.

If the enemy lane stays and pushes 2nd tower, you need ganks. You can punish that all day long. 

Just try to kindly ask the jungler to come collect some free gold because the other people don't understand map pressure and that they are completely overextended. *Should* be easy kills most of the time. There are often complicating factors, I realize; that's true even in plat+, but typically it's a bad idea for them to be pushed up that far as a duo.

Other moba the adc freezes and farms with denying the creeps - can’t do that in league :)

Yeah, getting a good freeze is difficult in League now.

I am 50/50 on whether or not I think that's a bad thing. It *does* encourage more action around the map. Which is cool. But It also deprives a team that's behind from an important comeback mechanic.

I like the way they have been talking about reworking the bounty system, because I think that could do a lot to help compensate for the loss of comeback options.

That answers a totally different question though. It answers "Why do the enemy bot lane go mid or top after they've taken first tower", not "why does my support go roam mid or top after the enemy team takes first tower".
I feel sorry for mid laners , if bot Lane gets crushed , say goodbye to your lane !!

Wait. You're whining because your support goes roam after you lose lane. You should be sitting at 2nd tier tower and freezing. If their bot lane comes to push 2nd tier then you can't blame only your support that your team isn't punishing  the enemy for sitting so far up. Like doesn't matter the elo supports need to go roam, especially when their adc is the safest adc that is also farming and stacking (muramana) so there was nothing wrong with her moving around the map. You should have no problem clearing wave and not dying as an ezreal.

Im asking a question. No whining anywhere here. I can say yall have the "right" strategy down pact but everyone has failed to understand I play in SILVER elo where no one does anything that's a strategy. They run around like chickens with their heads cut off flaming me as the adc. I simply asked why do supports love to abandon the CARRY of the game. 

(This means yes I do understand what NEEDS to be done but the chances of a silver team doing something RIGHT is slim to none)

My job as support isn't just to make sure you do well. If we've completely lost lane and our tower is gone, you need to farm responsibly under our tier 2 bot if top refuses to lane swap. Yes, as support, I should be there to make sure you can do it, but I ALSO need to go and make moves on the map so we don't have our other two laners and jungler also lose out.

Having ADC get behind doesn't mean Support needs to be behind as well. We have to affect the map. Support isn't leashed to the ADC, and shouldn't be.

You must play a game where your teammates cooperate with one another because in my cases if I ever politely ask for my team to do something all I do is get flamed. All in all no one has provided me with an answer that suffices for the number of lost games that I've had due to my support abandoning bot lane then sapping all the xp from mid. And when your "Adc" is the "carry" late game , I'm pretty sure as a support I wouldn't care about my 1/5 mid lane after my bot lost tower. Id still try to feed my adc becasue I know they come back. Meanwhile most others dont.
